query: SELECT t.id, t.`index`, t.title, ta.type, LEFT(ta.content, 100) as content_preview FROM tracks t JOIN track_assets ta ON t.id = ta.trackId WHERE t.title LIKE '%Price of the Pulpit%' AND ta.type IN ('lyrics', 'prompt') ORDER BY t.`index`, ta.type
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4PQbAAV1fA3eoWB.38fa72cffd94 --database b5PCTDMDy4xxT8TnZ4kC9Z --execute SELECT t.id, t.`index`, t.title, ta.type, LEFT(ta.content, 100) as content_preview FROM tracks t JOIN track_assets ta ON t.id = ta.trackId WHERE t.title LIKE '%Price of the Pulpit%' AND ta.type IN ('lyrics', 'prompt') ORDER BY t.`index`, ta.type
